name: choked
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
unable to speak or almost crying because of sadness or strong emotion: She tried to say a few words but found herself choked. I felt really choked up and teary. "This is the most wonderful day of my life," she said, her voice becoming choky. Related word
choke
More examplesFewer examplesI did get a bit choked at the end of the film.I was really choked to see her again.When he starts to speak, he sounds choked up.Who wouldn't get choked up seeing them so happy?
